markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unnerving Expansion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3831) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 169</row>

**Archetype** [Curse Maelstrom](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=190)

**Prerequisites**
[Curse Maelstrom Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3829)

</column>

---

You gather your curse around you and impel it to pour outward, expanding your maelstrom. The radius of the emanation of your curse maelstrom state increases by 5 feet until the end of your curse maelstrom state. The outpouring of the curse is unnerving. You attempt to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) a creature within the emanation of your curse maelstrom; you don't take penalties for not sharing a language with that creature.
name: Unnerving Expansion
